scripts.say: Direct hit on Bismarck confirmed! ... Hold on, it didn't have any effect on her speed!
Once I've recovered my aircraft, I'll prepare a second strike! Just you wait, Bismarck!
(... If she can maintain her speed in spite of her injuries, she must be a terribly powerful battleship.)
(And if she manages to seek refuge in Vichian waters, the going will get tough for us.)
(We must slow her down through any means necessary...!)
I received a message that Force H should be arriving soon! They'll make contact with Bismarck in 30 minutes!
So, all of the Royal Navy's most capable ships are in pursuit.
The Royal Family's honour hinges upon us. We shall sink Bismarck!
